document: REACTIONS OF MOLECULAR NITROGEN WITH TITANOCENE AND ITS DERIVATIVES by Robert Hyman Marvich A dissertation submitted in partial fulfillment of the requirements for the degree of Doctor of Philosophy (Chemistry) in The University of Michigan 1971 Doctoral Committee: Professor Hans H.
